studyArms.name: Phase I - Single Arm Exercise
studyArms.description: 15 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments participate in a single arm 6 weeks remote exercise intervention using the Exergaming platform, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

studyArms.name: Phase II - Remote Exercise Intervention
studyArms.description: Subjects receive the Exergaming system at home and perform 24 exercise sessions remotely over 12 weeks, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

studyArms.name: Phase II - Supervised Exercise Control
studyArms.description: Subjects perform the 24 exercise sessions in person under supervision with the Exergaming system over 12 weeks, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

studyCohorts.name: Phase I Participants
studyCohorts.characteristic: 15 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments (MoCA score 20-26) participating in pilot 6-week program

studyCohorts.name: Phase II Participants
studyCohorts.characteristic: 100 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments (MoCA score 20-26) participating in 12-week RCT

arms.name: Phase I - Single Arm Exercise
arms.description: 15 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments participate in a single arm 6 weeks remote exercise intervention using the Exergaming platform, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

arms.name: Phase II - Remote Exercise Intervention
arms.description: Subjects receive the Exergaming system at home and perform 24 exercise sessions remotely over 12 weeks, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

arms.name: Phase II - Supervised Exercise Control
arms.description: Subjects perform the 24 exercise sessions in person under supervision with the Exergaming system over 12 weeks, twice per week for approximately 30 minutes

cohorts.name: Phase I Participants
cohorts.characteristic: 15 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments (MoCA score 20-26) participating in pilot 6-week program

cohorts.name: Phase II Participants
cohorts.characteristic: 100 subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments (MoCA score 20-26) participating in 12-week RCT

epochs.name: Screening/Baseline
epochs.description: Initial assessment including physical examination, medical history, questionnaires, gait and balance assessment

epochs.name: Phase I Treatment
epochs.description: 6 weeks of remote exercise intervention with 12 at-home sessions

epochs.name: Phase II Treatment
epochs.description: 12 weeks of exercise intervention with 24 sessions (remote or supervised depending on arm)

epochs.name: Phase II Follow-up
epochs.description: 6 weeks, 12 weeks, 6 months, and 12 months follow-up assessments
